subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Detroit Red Wings goaltender Jimmy Howard has been ruled out for at least a week after injuring his left knee again, putting his spot on the United States team for the Olympics in doubt.
snippet: Detroit Red Wings goaltender Jimmy Howard has been ruled out for at least a week after injuring his left knee again, putting his spot on the United States team for the Olympics in doubt.
